entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect value provided by DirectoryInfo.Attributes when directory does not exist #108345
  • There is no good way to tell if a service is added when using Keyed Services #108346
  • StreamReader.ReadAsync not honoring cancellation token #108342
  • [API Proposal]: ValidationResult constructor with a single member name #108338
    Future
  • Potential inconsistent MemoryCache stats #108333
  • Add key wrapping algorithms requested by Key Vault #108332
    10.0.0
  • Add post quantum algorithm support #108331
    10.0.0
  • Exporting Certificate with a password always chooses SHA1-3DES encryption #108330
  • [Regression] SIGSEGV on linux-arm64 self-contained trimmed single-file .NET 9 app #108327
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: The parameter is incorrect. #108322
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 SVE: Duplicating a scalar to a vector is non optimal #108321
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 SVE: Extended addressing modes are not used #108320
    10.0.0
  • STJ generator with external (generated) context class #108317
    Future
  • Unable to Install dotnetcore2 on macOS ARM64 (M1, M2, M3) Using Poetry #108316
  • Regex does not match, given a character-range from non-peripheral minus #108335
  • Test failure: GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd/dlbigleakthd.cmd #108308

Closed

  • Guid.Version does not return correct version in all situations #108267
  • Several BlockingCollection.TryTake inefficiencies #28426
  • Document HttpClient migration from HttpWebRequest/ServicePoint(Manager) #92690
    9.0.0
  • windows-arm64 release CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds failing on Windows headers #106521
    10.0.0
  • Polymorphic JSON deserialization hangs indefinitely in native AOT since .NET 9 Preview 7 #108329
  • net9.0-ios regression causing `InvalidProgramException` in certain circumstances #108108
    9.0.0
  • How can I compile a Native AOT app with AddressSanitizer? #108315
  • 使用 SmtpClient 发送带有附件的邮件 有一定几率会触发“操作已超时”错误 #107128
  • Allow a single Span to have multiple underlying buffers "stiched" together as one #108313
  • .NET event counters from System.Runtime are not reported in some circumstances in .NET 9 RC 1 #107919
    10.0.0
  • VÍDEO Portal Zacarias Sabrina Saraiva Miss PPK Concurso #108310

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    needs-area-label
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Backport PR #108311 - Fix statics issue with barriers #108347
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the QCall contract for GC suppression. #108344
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [testing] Skip running R2Rdump in crossgen test targets so we can see… #108341
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    needs-area-label
  • Test NuGet bug fix #108337
    needs-area-label
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #108328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Wrap xunit's `WriteLine` methods in try catch. #108319
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Fix statics issue by using data dependencies #108309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • fix guid version > 7 #108314
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108266
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/9.0] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108218
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108244
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix build-runtime-tests-and-send-to-helix auth for internal PRs #107635
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Reduce funceval abort #108256
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix statics issue with barriers #108311
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable policheck and tsa #108312
    needs-area-label
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Change ICU `WasmBuildTests` to use `wasmconsole` and `wasmbrowser` templates #108271
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Unblock System.Linq testing in nativeAOT outerloop #108302
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove HelperMethodFrame from `Delegate` construction #108217
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: refactor AddCodeDsc #108095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2548224 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert `ReflectionInvocation.CanValueSpecialCast()` to managed #108305
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]: MSBuild crashes on parallel build using docker #43750
  • Let me define the path to built assemblies for dotnet `publish --no-build` #43747
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with error "Missing partial modifier on declaration of type 'AffineTransform2DEffect3'; another partial declaration of this type exists" #43746

PullRequests

Created

  • Create a dotnet-new template for .gitattributes #43764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make a parallel loop for define static web assets #43743
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Support additional VS component IDs for workloads #43675
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Delay serializing the manifest until absolutely necessary #43745
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2548289 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid serializing/deserializing manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • If class has primary constructor, cannot provide XML documentation comment for class #75272

Closed

  • An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from C:\ Users\sacsharm\.nuget\packages\system.text.json\6.0.0\analyzers\dotnet\roslyn3.11\cs\System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.dll #74252
  • "Encapsulate field" throws an error when field with uppercase name is declared in class with primary constructor #75210
    Backlog
  • Change property to method refactoring crashes when property used in property pattern #75135
    Backlog
  • TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources failed in CI #74342
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35326.225 #75276
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35326.88 #75271
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35326.96 #75270

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump razor for serialization changes #75282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing NuGet bug fix #75280

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75277

    auto-merge

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: additional tests #75283

  • Revert "Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs (#75172)" (#75279) #75284
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable Policheck #75281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in encapsulate field with primary constructors #75254
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix crash when converting properties to methods #75256
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs" #75279
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Stabilize lsp workspace diagnostic test #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not load CodeStyle analyzers added by the SDK #75250
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75275
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • update configs for snap #75263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap for 17.12 P3 #75273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collapse the rename UI when commit starts #75213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Detect more fluent cases for converting collection expressions #75267
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Allow reordering members #75257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Fix issue simplifying name in speculative context #75255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #58121
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json_middleware #58120
  • Perf improvement: https #58119
  • [Blazor] InputFile support for `cancel` event #58118
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, json_middleware, json_middleware #58114
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #58113
  • Server-side Blazor Disable IUserIdProvider ？ #58112

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_spring #58097
  • Cannot Create A DataRow Object #58077
  • Perf improvement: caching, multiple_queries #58098
  • OpenApi inline enum for query parameters #57979
    9.0.0
  • Blazor SSR error when rendermode is InteractiveAuto #57874

PullRequests

Created

Updated

  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile #58109

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #24977
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Trimming in Release is too aggressive, is there a workaround? #24976
  • I cant instal .NET sdk on Macbook Air M1 #24975
  • iOS Crashes when debug into iPhone Emulator. #24974
  • Setting NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar="False" on modally presented NavigationPage causes top padding on iOS #24972
  • Control does not update from binding anymore after MultiBinding.ConvertBack is called #24969
  • CollectionView: Header, Footer, and Empty View Missing When Using it as Templates; Footer Moves to Bottom when Empty View is Enabled #24968
  • Content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled #24967
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24966
  • [iOS] `CollectionView` with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a `RefreshView` #24961
  • [iOS] RefreshView indicator not displayed when IsRefreshing is manually set to true and collectionView is at the top #24960
  • [MAUI][iOS18.0][macOS15.0]A space will be automatically added when you click “-” button on Editor D10 page #24959
  • Opening New Window On Android Not Working #24955

Closed

  • Change default BlazorWebView local address from 0.0.0.0 to something safer #24363
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • CollectionView with IsGrouped="True" throws NSInternalInconsistencyException with iOS 18 SDK #24971
  • Badge View doesn't show when I add handle for Shell Renderer #24956
  • Collection was modified after the enumerator was instantiated. #23597
    Backlog
  • Grid layout breaks in build target='Release' when ColumnDefinitions defined via StaticResource #20244
    Backlog
  • Content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled #24927
  • AppThemeBinding does not work on ToolbarItems #24878
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS] Border often has wrong initial bounds #23494
  • DataTrigger does not work on Mac Catalyst #23672
  • Editor control on Windows uses CR as line ending #24361
  • didReceiveIncomingPushWithPayload does not work with closed or background application #24374
  • labels not showing #24778
  • CarouselView Animation frozen Android #24771
  • CollectionView SelectionColor Property #24768
  • Error in Xamarin .Shared.targets #24790
  • Coding #24772

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24973
    do-not-merge
  • [iOS] Fix NRE in Shell SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker #24970
    community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    community ✨

Merged

  • [XC] Add feature switch to enable compiling bindings with source #24924
    area-xaml, 9.0-rc2
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
    area-blazor
  • [C] avoid concurrent access to _values #24579
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area-xaml, stale
  • Try update arcade main #24964
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar
  • Run Android Device tests on Sonoma #24958
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Update MAUI net8 to be latest public release #24954

Updated

  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #24952
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24953
    9.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [UITesting] Moved ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to Appium #24934
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area-xaml, stale
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20240925231640755 to net9.0 #24935
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix shadow invalidation on Android #24941
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot specify backing field for nested owned entities. #34780
  • EF Core should honor [MaxLength] attributes from interfaces an Entity Implements #34779
  • Define an Unidirectional Many to Many without Join Table #34775
  • In SQLite, EF converts the DateTime value "" to 0001-01-01 00:00:00, not null #34773

Closed

  • EFCore does not respect [MaxLength] if it came on a field from an interface #34778
  • How to define a backing filed for a collection of owned entities? #34774
  • Query/JSON: ordering JSON collection using Order (or OrderBy(x => x)) fails during translation #34755
  • Support new LINQ methods #34767

PullRequests

Created

  • Make dotnet-ef build properly on Linux. #34781

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Use the specified migrations assembly in validation #34777
    Servicing-approved
  • Simplify away NonQueryExpression #34768

Updated

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
    waiting-for-response
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770
